item.title: Could These Eye Drops End the Need for Reading Glasses?
item.description: Trials of vision-improving substances are showing good results, though so far only two have been authorized for use in the United States.

item.title: Target Promo Codes and Deals: Up to 50% Off
item.description: Get $50 off your next order, 20% off sitewide, and up to 50% off with Target coupon codes and deals.

item.title: Home Depot Promo Codes: 10% Off | September 2025

item.title: Xiaomi 17 Pro and 17 Pro Max: Specs, Release Date, Price, Features
item.description: Following the 15 Ultra, the new Xiaomi 17 Pro Max sounds and looks very familiar to a certain iPhone, but with a twist.

item.title: Amazon Might Owe You $51. Here’s How to Find Out if You’re Eligible
item.description: In a settlement with the FTC, Amazon will have to pay out over a billion dollars to US customers for “deceptive” sign-up and cancellation processes.
